isEnabled.description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

disableLocalAuth.description: Opt-out of local authentication and ensure only MSI and AAD can be used exclusively for authentication.

msaAppType.description: Microsoft App Type for the bot

openWithHint.description: The hint to browser (e.g. protocol handler) on how to open the bot for authoring

parameters.description: Contains resource parameters defined as key/value pairs.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether the bot is in an isolated network

schemaTransformationVersion.description: The channel schema transformation version for the bot

storageResourceId.description: The storage resourceId for the bot

tenantId.description: The Tenant Id for the bot
